page.description: Removes directories recursively in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function to call if deleting the directory succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to delete the directory.

page.discussion: The phoneGapRemoveDirectoryRecurse method removes directories recursively in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onComplete function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
